title: Sultan Kot railway station
content:
Sultan Kot Railway Station (Urdu: سلطان کوٹ ریلوے اسٹیشن, Sindhi: سلطان ڪوٽ ریلوي اسٽیشن) is located in Sultan Kot village, Shikarpur district of Sindh province of the Pakistan.[1]

This article about a railroad station in Sindh is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
